title: Is jazz better than classical? - Quora

response.answer_text: Is jazz better than classical? “Better” is a strange word in this context. I happen to enjoy and appreciate “classical” music, especially contemporary works. However, I have never studied jazz and so cannot appreciate all that ti going on, but it would never occur to me to downplay jazz’s importance, the skill of its performers, and the fact that it brings pleasure to so many people. They are just different languages.
